text: Remember the Josie and the Pussycats movie!? It's been 16 years since the movie starring Gabriel Mann, Missi Pyles, Rachel Leigh Cook, Tara Reid and Rosario Dawson was released but SO CUTE to see the gals looking good and'back together': ) Just recently the cast reunited to do a panel along with the film's co - writers and directors Deborah Kaplan and Harry Elfont. Do we smell... SEQUEL??? : ) Get more scoop straight from the ladies here : http : / / bit. ly / 2fsSFae
